text: Gei goe ga helekai gi digaula bolo ko Au, go Dimaadua di Gowaa Aamua, go di God o Israel, ga laha mai dagu dangada hai hegau go Nebuchadnezzar, di king o Babylonia gi kinei i Egypt, ga haganoho dono lohongo king i hongo nia hadugalaa ala ne danu kooe, ga hagaduu aga dana hale laa aamua nonua.
